lead_paragraph: Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton will be able to re-use the power unit whose failure sent him to the back of the starting grid at the last race in China, Mercedes said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Lewis Hamilton Can Re-Use Power Unit That Failed in China
headline.main: Lewis Hamilton Can Re-Use Power Unit That Failed in China

snippet: Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton will be able to re-use the power unit whose failure sent him to the back of the starting grid at the last race in China, Mercedes said on Monday....
